meanings.definition: A curved or bent shape or position.
meanings.sent1: The tree branch had a gentle kembo.
meanings.sent2: She admired the kembo of the river as it flowed around the bend.
meanings.sent3: The kembo of the road sign made it look like it was waving.
meanings.sent4: The kembo of the rainbow stretched across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The kembo of the roller coaster track added excitement to the ride.

meanings.definition: To bend or curve in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: He had to kembo down to pick up the fallen pen.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast could kembo effortlessly during her routine.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to kembo its body to fit into the small box.
meanings.sent4: The road seemed to kembo around the mountain.
meanings.sent5: She watched the snake kembo through the grass with curiosity.
